1)IPv6 주소  : 2001:0DA7:0001:BAC1:0000:0000:A123:FFFF /64
 Host 범위 : 2001:0DA7:0001:BAC1:0000:0000:0000:0001~2001:0DA7:0001:BAC1:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF

2) IPv6 주소 : FE80:0000:0000:0000:0321:5FFF:CAFE:FE7E /48
 Host 범위 : FE80:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0001~FE80:0000:0000:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF

3) IPv6 주소 : FF02:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0001 /80
 Host 범위 : FF02:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0000:0001~FF02:0000:0000:0000:0000:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF

4) IPv6 주소 : FF03:0000:0000:0000:5FCD:0000:0000:0123 /88
 Host 범위 : FF03:0000:0000:0000:5FCD:0000:0000:0001~FF03:0000:0000:0000:5FCD:00FF:FFFF:FFFF

5) IPv6 주소 : AC78:2000:4000:3000:0000:0000:0000:46CD /52
 Host 범위 : AC78:2000:4000:3000:0000:0000:0000:0001~AC78:2000:4000:3FFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF:FFFF
